org.silex.blocks.Image

type
class
This class is instanciated by the BlockBuilder class, when the corresponding tag is found in the block's BlockData::className attribute It is in charge of loading an image into an ImageDOMObject and set it as the Block::domObject property

Constructor

new()
Class constructor

Instance Variables

url : String

URL for the image

x : Float

desired position for the DOMObject

Instance Methods

initDone() : Void

After all properties are set by BlockBuilder, we can load the Image resource
